com.hula.lang.parser

Class FailsWithValidationTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • com.hula.lang.BaseHulaTestCase
          • com.hula.lang.parser.FailsWithValidationTests
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class FailsWithValidationTests
extends BaseHulaTestCase
    For commands that declare they can fail (using the @FailsWith annotation), the parser validates that failure handling is present in the script

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FailsWithValidationTests() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testFailHandlerValidation_2()
      This tests that the parser validation works when the failure handlers directly follow a nested block containing a command which requires a failure handler
      void testFailHandlerValidation()
      This tests that the parser validation works when the failure handlers directly follow the command which requires a failure handler
      void testMissingFailHandlerProducesParseError_2()
      This tests that the parser validation works when the failure handlers come before a command which requires a failure handler
      void testMissingFailHandlerProducesParseError_3()
      This tests that the parser validation works when a command which requires failure handlers is invoked within an existing failure handling block
      void testMissingFailHandlerProducesParseError()
      This tests that the parser validation works when the failure handlers are not present in a script containing a command which requires a failure handler
